name: scott vish
text: This is located on the UK campus.  Delivery times are incorrectly estimated by Hours, yes hours,  a 40 minute estimate was wrong by 2 hours!  Funny thing is every call they told me it was on its way. Never again. If the pizza left the store …More

name: Arthur Jaramillo
text: Would have given them zero stars if it was an option. Ordered a pizza with EXTRA sauce and got no sauce. When the driver got here he was apparently unable to follow simple instructions on how to get to my house and I had to walk out in the rain to meet him. Never ordering from this place again.

name: Eric Barnett
text: Great place. Fast service. Great food. Highly recommend.

name: Israel Arambul
text: If I could give no star I would. I advise no one buy a pizza or anything else from here says they close at 12 but when I call they say there closed and it's not even 11!!

name: trogdorthe8th
text: Love their pizza, but I wouldn't recommend ordering online, call it in to make sure you know how long the wait will be first. It doesn't tell you what the wait time is until after you've ordered- I just had to cancel one because after I ordered, it said it would take them THREE HOURS to deliver it to me.

name: J Woo
text: one of the best pizza huts in lex. consistently awesome(for the hut) pies and the manager is awesome. convenient for campus pedeatrians as well.

name: Dachuan Wang
text: The worst restaurant I have met. I ordered 1 pizza at 8, until now it still doesn't deliver to my apartment, This situation happened many times! I never order pizza in this store again, I swear!

name: John Allen
text: This was the nastiest greasiest pizza I have ever eaten. It was my dads birthday too. I will never eat at this place ever again. I wish I would have ordered from a different place!

name: Joshua Fightmaster
text: Ordered a pizza for me and my 5 year old. Pizza showed about an hour later. Driver was polite and courteous. Brought pizza into the house and opened it up. Half of it was missing cheese and toppings. Just dough and sauce.  Strike 1. My son …More

name: Angela Jones
text: Love this pizza hut, the only place my boyfriend and I will get pizza. Maybe its just because were used to it but its the place we love and know.

name: Aaron O
text: One of the worst pizzas I've ever gotten.  Crust tasted like cardboard and they forgot to put a topping on pizza that I ordered. Barely any sauce or cheese and long wait. Ill stick with Papa for my pizza.

name: Michael Maiden
text: Service is horrible. I had an online order that said would take 30 minutes. It got here 3 hours late. On another instance I had an order that was burnt and they refused to send me one immediately. I had to wait 2 extra hours for an order they messed up.

name: Amy C.
text:
Recently my boyfriend and I ordered a pizza for delivery, after I paid for it online, a message popped up that they weren't delivering because of the weather.
But they still charged me. We talked to the manager who had no record of our …More

name: Majdi Amira
text: Great place, fast deliveries. Nice staff.

name: Local HVAC Guy
text: Must be the busiest pizza joint this side of the Mississippi River.  2 Hour wait time is standard.

name: Kem Osborne
text: Called to order a pizza and its over a 30 mins late shity customer service as well

name: Aliyah Williams
text: Do yhey even oreder it on hawkins cause I want some pizza

name: Joe Styer
text: handy location and friendly staff

name: Nick Benthem
text: The worst tasting pizza I've ever had. They barely even cooked it!

name: Brett Crouch
text: Took a hour and 15 minutes to deliver. This wasn't the first time either. I'm done with Pizza Hut forever.

name: Shawna Griggs
text: This place was awful

name: faisal s. ahmed
text: Great food but poor maintenance

name: Rayna Shearer
text: Awful! I ordered at 4:32 pm, my work is a block away and it is not 6:16pm and they have still not shown up nor will they answer the phone!!

name: Adam Cummins
text: This place can suck on my ass

name: Sawyer Curd
text: it made me want to fweh my fweh

name: Jim Kreiner
text: Ordered pizza on line for delivery at 6pm. At 40 minutes late we called to try and find out where it was and no one is answering the phone nor is a machine or phone system picking up.
